mapper.select: select id, link, alias, status, (case when role then (select group_concat(r.role_code) from t_link_role_or_permission lrp inner join t_role r on lrp.role_id = r.id where lrp.link_id = lm.id and lrp.status = #{status} and r.status = #{status}) else (select group_concat(p.permission_code) from t_link_role_or_permission lrp inner join t_permission p on lrp.permission_id = p.id where lrp.link_id = lm.id and lrp.status = #{status} and p.status = #{status}) end) roleOrPermissionCodes, role, order_, all_, date_format(lm.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time from t_link_manage lm where lm.status = #{status}

select lm.id, lm.link, lm.alias, (case when role then (select group_concat(r.role_code) from t_link_role_or_permission lrp inner join t_role r on lrp.role_id = r.id where lrp.link_id = lm.id and lrp.status = #{status} and r.status = #{status}) else (select group_concat(p.permission_code) from t_link_role_or_permission lrp inner join t_permission p on lrp.permission_id = p.id where lrp.link_id = lm.id and lrp.status = #{status} and p.status = #{status}) end ) roleOrPermissionCodes, lm.role, lm.all_, date_format(lm.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') create_time , lm.create_user_id, lm.status, lm.order_ from t_link_manage lm order by lm.order_ desc, lm.id desc limit #{start}, #{pageSize}

select r.id, r.role_code code, (select 1 from t_link_role_or_permission lrp where lrp.role_id = r.id and lrp.link_id = #{lnid} and lrp.status=#{status} and r.status=#{status} and lrp.role = true) has from t_role r where r.status=#{status}

select p.id, p.permission_code code, (select 1 from t_link_role_or_permission lrp where lrp.permission_id = p.id and lrp.link_id = #{lnid} and lrp.status=#{status} and p.status=#{status} and lrp.role = false) has from t_permission p where p.status=#{status}
